website_summaries.verdict: A 50 A plasma cutter that is capable of a 1/2" maximum clean cut and a 3/4" maximum severance cut.
pros: This plasma cutter from Lotos Technology cuts through stainless steel, alloy steel, mild steel, copper, aluminum, and other metal materials
The unit is quick and easy to set up and comes with a 30-day refund and a 1-year limited warranty
cons: As with the other Lotos Technology plasma cutter that we spotlighted, this one also tends to burn through consumables rather quickly

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year
customer_reviews.text: Hello I purchased a lotos lt5000d plasma cutter from you all less than a year ago and I tried using it today but I'm not getting any air pressure at the torch it was working fine a week ago. I have good air pressure After the pressure regular/filter but not through the machine and at the torch. What could be the problem
customer_reviews.author: Siraj

customer_reviews.title: SHOCKED
customer_reviews.text: Well...I couldn't believe it. I ran mine off a Bobcat 250 portable welder/generator 11000w. I used the 220v side, with a portable Air compressor that maintained 120psi. I cut 5/8" steel, (rusty). it was slow to cut but it was smooth. It pretty much Zipped through the 3/8" . I rarely cut 5/8". but 3/8 is average more often. I was shocked at show smooth and consistent it was. it uses "L con" consumables. For what I paid, I could burn one of these up every year and it would still be worth buy another. it would be 4 years before I spent "Miller" money I am so happy that these things are coming down in price. Thanks LOTOS.....Nice work.
customer_reviews.author: Stormsailor1

customer_reviews.title: My first LONG TERM review 6+ years ownership!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I can write the type of review I always wish I could find. I have owned this plasma cutter for almost 7 years and I can say that it is pretty darn good. My first one did just stop working but that is not without working for countless hours in a dusty environment basically all the way up while cutting and paying no attention to duty cycle. My first LT5000 made me a ton of money and with little to no problems. I bought another one (this one) without hesitation because I was so happy with the first. I only hope this one lasts me another 6+ years!!
customer_reviews.author: Meridith Jourdain

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: it's small but it feels solid. Got it, hooked it up and did a test cut on some 4" wide 1/8" flat stock steel plate. Cut right through with no problems. I'm running mine off 240v. Will be using it to build a rotisserie smoker. Will update review after I've completed it. Update: Used it to cut the top off my smokers firebox so I could put a "hotplate" flat surface on it. Cut through the 3/8" steel with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua G Strazeski

customer_reviews.title: it was a good buy for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: The LT5000D functions well. It is more of a hobbyist tool. I would not suggest this plasma cutter for everyday shop use. You do have to be careful of metal splatter due to the hose and cover is plastic. Don't plan on putting the torch and ground back in the carry bag. It was torn when it arrived and even trying to be careful I ended up ripping it out the rest of the way. The ground cable is kind of short too. But all things considered, it was a good buy for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: LGK

customer_reviews.title: Works well... Reasonably priced consumable tricky to come by.
customer_reviews.text: This worked well out of the box. The power plug needs to be adapted to US 120 or 220... When I ran out of consumables that came with it, I got some that were supposedly compatible but the electrode threads were not correct.... I didn't want to hassle with this forever so I purchased a new torch which have internals that went on with some minor effort and very low cost. now I can use cheap consumables.......RIVERWELD esab PT-31 LG-40 20072 ... Actually seems to have a finer torch flame
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Like A Champ!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. Shipped on time. Arrived in a timely manor in good condition. All parts included. Only minor issue would be the manufacturer’s choice of a non-standard plug. Finding a 3prong locking plug to fit was expensive ($20.00). Finding one that was rated (40amp as per manufacturer’s recommendation) for the load is impossible. After the initial setup, the plasma cutter works far beyond my expectations and will be a fun go tool in my hobby shop hopefully for years to come. Even though it is rated to operate on both 110/220 I would recommend using the plasma on 220 as the cutting depth isn’t hindered by a lack of voltage.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Beck II

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service, I got this as a gift December 2018. I had tried it out when I first got it and it worked as it should. It sat in my shop for a year and a half before I used it again. Made 1 cut with it and it stopped working. called customer support and they worked with me on getting it repaired. Sent me a new board for it and still not working. They had me send it back to them and they sent me a new unit. { NOTE THE UNIT WAS OUT OF WARANTY} AND THEY DID EVERTHING TO MAKE IT RIGHT.. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: sassy

customer_reviews.title: Overheats constantly
customer_reviews.text: It has an overheating fault switch that's triggered every time you touch the workpiece. In order to get the machine working again you have to turn it off and on. I feel like an idiot having purchased another Lotus product.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting... be sure to adjust air pressure correctly.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for an entire season now. It works well. At first, I thought that it burned through electrodes too fast. Then I found out the air pressure was too low. It is easy to mistake because the 'running pressure' is different from the static line pressure. When you hit the button, and the air flows, you'll notice a significant drop in pressure while the air is flowing. To accommodate, you may need to "overpressure" your air. Experiment around with it before you burn through a ton of electrodes. Also, you can find consumable parts for cheap if you shop around.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Rak

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the money
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome machine this is. I have it hooked up to 30amp 220V current and it cut through 3/8 steel and old springs like butter. I am going to try some sheet metal to see what the settings needs to be. Only negative I can think of is the manual wish it had a chart with recommended settings for steel thickness. But I can figure that out by trying it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. 5 stars but there’s a catch.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Cuts thicker metal than advertised but not clean. One thing to beware of. It consumes tips and the white porcelain tips. That’s why they are called Consumables. Check the price of these parts. They are expensive.
customer_reviews.author: B. HOLM

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a rush!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I'm pissed, not at my new plasma cutter, but with myself and waiting so long in buying one. I made 2 brackets and modified another inside of 2 hours of which would have taken me 3 to 4 time more. Once I got past my ignorance of how to use it and used the minimum amperage as per the manual supplied I was on my way to a new experience! If you do even once in awhile fabrication and you value your time then have one in your shop.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying the first one I ordered did not come on! Contacted customer support and was instructed to box it up and ship it back. Once I did they promptly shipped a replacement. The replacement was tested before being sent. I tried it as soon as I got it and it worked perfectly! I would give 5 stars if not for the fist broken cutter!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica LeBato

customer_reviews.title: Great cutter for the price, really enough for my home shop.
customer_reviews.text: Caught this on sale and was sceptical, wow this thing works great. Cuts plenty thick for my needs. Air line fittings didn't match up to my common 3/8 fittings but no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas hymer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: Highly impressed with this little unit. A lot of power in a small foot print. This is a little bit bigger area than the size of a sheet of paper, but has no problems cutting 1/2” mild steel.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth 5 dollars. It didn't last 45 min. The over heat light comes on everytime I try to cut. I have tried calling the company several times and noone will answer the phone ever. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brown

customer_reviews.title: WOW FIRST TIME USED IT BURNS STEEL LIKE BUTTER, BEST ON 240 VOLT WILL NEED TO ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW FIRST TIME USED IT BURNS STEEL LIKE BUTTER, BEST ON 240 VOLT WILL NEED TO MAKE UP A 50AMP EXTENTION CORD AND MAKE SUR YOU GET RIGHT FEMALE END TAKE TO YOUR ELECTRICAL SUPPLY STORE TO GET THE RIGHT SUPPLIES. IT COME WITH A 240 VOLT 50AMP MALE 3 PRONG END ON IT. YOU MUST KNOW THE DIFERENCE OF 3 PRONG 120VOLT 30AMP AND 3 PROG 240VOLT 50AMP. THEY LOOK SAME BUT NOT!!! AND ARE WIRED DEFERENTLY. NOTE 240 VOLT 50 AMP IS 2 POLE 1 GROUND. 120 VOLT IS 1 POLE 30 AMP 1 NUTRAL 1 GROUND.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I burned up nozzle cause I didn't hook up the air. (my bad) I have since ordered replacements
customer_reviews.author: James E Cardinal

customer_reviews.title: Worked well initially, quickly failed.
customer_reviews.text: I had used it for maybe three days, I laid down maybe a foot of weld when it started leaking air from somewhere inside of the machine. Even if I had the machine turned off completely, the air pressure in my compressor would drop overnight. At first I thought it was maybe one of my fittings, but it wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Cartagena

customer_reviews.title: Why pay more?
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase! Saving so much time compared to using a death wheel. Did have a small air leak inside the unit after a few uses. I am sure this was my fault, had the air regulator set too high. Simple to fix, remove cover and simply wiggled the plastic air hose. It uses a push to connect fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Works but has some issues
customer_reviews.text: It works but you have to buy a plug adapter and it draws a lot of amps if you are using a 110v 20 amp breaker you can’t have anything else going at the same time and you will still trip the breaker some times. Would work best for 220 only.
customer_reviews.author: C.H.

customer_reviews.title: torch distance
customer_reviews.text: I have the unit where you have to touch the metal to initiate the arc, LT5000D....with the factory torch, is it supposed to be 'dragged' across the metal or some sweet spot distance from it.....1/8" or more like 1/16" etc. I am primarily cutting 3/8" steel.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley F.

customer_reviews.title: get it done
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and great for hobby projects... the cuts can be a little messy but its a get what you pay for type of deal... I wouldn't recommend using it on 110v
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: allows me to start and complete work I used to pay others to do. Cuts like butter tough steel.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Shot Transportation Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Plasma Cutter
customer_reviews.text: We found the Lotos LT5000D to be more compact than expected. Nice quality in workmanship and simple in design. Don't let the small size fool you on the cutting power. It is very powerful for nearly any cutting job. So far we have cut up to 1/2" plate without any problems. It cut through rusted and painted metal without any problems too. Once an arc is started it will keep cutting though about any surface. With this in mind, the Pilot Arc model didn't seem that necessary to us. I recommend this Lotos Plasma Cutter to anyone looking for a powerful and portable plasma cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Maddog

customer_reviews.title: Definite time saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband. He has been fabricating pig roasters and other things in his spare time. He was using a grinding wheel to cut the metal before. What took him 2 weeks to cut with the grinder has only taken him a couple hours with this plasma cutter. He said this was the best gift ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer wolabaugh

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the air leaks from inside and the hose shielding material is very thin burned many holes in it
customer_reviews.author: Chris Morris jr

customer_reviews.title: works awesome once i got the defective one replaced
customer_reviews.text: first unit i received was defective. wouldn't even melt exhaust pipe. amazon sent me a replacement immediately and the 2nd unit works great. im using it on 110 and it cuts through 1/8 inch plate steel like butter. be sure to order more consumables because while your learning how to use it you will burn through several.
customer_reviews.author: sean m weigel

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. Don't try to cut anything too thick (over ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the low cost point and performance. This thing is amazing. Don't try to cut anything too thick (over the recommended depth) and you will not have any issues with this item. I've used it now for cutting pipe and expanded metal and it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Marquardt

customer_reviews.title: LT 5000D plasma cutter
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this model plasma torch on 2/17 and received it on 2/20 FAST shipping. I have only used it on 120 volts so far but it cut 1/4" steel plate at 30 amps quickly and smoothly. Instructions are sadly lacking and it ships without a plug but I am extremely happy with this unit. A hint, if you search the plasma cutter sections for other manufacturers you can get some useful information about set up and settings. Overall I think the unit is 5 star, also american distributor,one year warranty, duties paid,etc....
customer_reviews.author: carl g

customer_reviews.title: can hardly cut 1/4"
customer_reviews.text: this thing really struggle cutting 1/4" ... thinnner material is ok.
customer_reviews.author: ZaT

customer_reviews.title: Great plasma cutter and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Does better than I expected it to do. When it first arrived it had a minor problem with the Torch. Contacted the company and no questions asked sent new torch with extra consumables. By far best customer service I’ve ever experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Does everything I need on a 30A 120V circuit.
customer_reviews.text: I have mine running on the same circuit I have my Lincoln mig welder on. Works great. I haven't used any other plasma cutters, but this one has certainly done everything I've asked it to. 3/8 Steel plate, no problem. 1/2 rebar, no problem. 18ga stainless sheet, no problemo. Fast, clean cuts and no bottles to run out in the middle of a job. And I really like that there's far less residual heat in the cut compared to doing the same job with a torch. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: W. Burke

customer_reviews.title: The most for your money
customer_reviews.text: OK first, it is very affordable. It works like a $1000 plus unit. I had a customer question to Lotos and they responded right off with a very nice person that did everything to make sure I understood. If I had to describe it in one word: WOW! Out of all I bought on Amazon, this is the one I ah happiest with. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Aroostook Dave

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This plasma cutter is definitely worth buying. It cut up to a 3/4 inch mild steel plate pretty clean. I had never used a plasma before and found it really easy to use. I would definitely recommend this plasma to anyone in the need of one. ( the pictures show a 3/16 inch plate, a 1/2 inch plate, and a 3/4 inch plate)
customer_reviews.author: Blas Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now, Great value for what it does
customer_reviews.text: I've just used this once but it was quick to set up and easy to use. I've cut some 3/8 and 1/2 mild steel cut like butter. I wish it did not come with a twist lock plug but its easy to change. Product was well packed and looks well designed and super light. Good length of torch cable. Wish I bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best plasma cutter for the money by far
customer_reviews.text: The thing that made me nervous is another comment I read said this is a Harbor Freight product. I was a bit scared. But it has held up very well. dont get me wrong, this thing is not built like a Lincoln or a Miller, but it works for light duty. Theres a little switch that broke off from the handle. Just remember to buy the consumables with it. You will burn through quite a bit of those.
customer_reviews.author: Baseline

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works great. using for auto-bodywork. my only other experience is with an old miller unit the size of a cabinet and this little unit outperforms it easily.
customer_reviews.author: poco

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Cutter
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little cutter I have found. Ordered online and had in two days thru the mail. I have been able to cut everything I have tried with perfection. It has done exactly what I expected and more. The only thing I would change is to order more consumables when you order. Comes with one tip and you need that for practice. Had more tips in a couple of days of order. I have already recommned to several friends and family. Craig H.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Very valuable for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing really suprised me! Cuts like a dream
customer_reviews.author: James Jergens

customer_reviews.title: Reduce what you expect for 208v if you have 3 phase
customer_reviews.text: As like many reviews, this is a great unit for the cost. As per the title, if you have 208v 3 phase power, it kind of struggles getting through 3/8 steel plate, which is likely expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Guide
customer_reviews.text: Does lotus have a wheel guide for the LT 5000. Or suggestion for a guide
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: does what it claims.
customer_reviews.text: i wired this thing up and it does everything the description says it can. llight and plenty of duty cycle. Lotos consumables are expensive but can be found from other manufactures for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: great8

customer_reviews.title: what a great plasma!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for autobody repair and custom work and this is amazing it cuts 1/4 plate without even trying, and cuts very cleanly compared to others ive used. if you are looking for a plasma look no further buy this one. you will be more then happy. and it has no issue with painted or rusty metal it only needs a small bare metal spot to start.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Z

customer_reviews.title: Good item! Does not cut through the thickness it
customer_reviews.text: Good item! Does not cut through the thickness it advertises
customer_reviews.author: Owen White

customer_reviews.title: Good machine for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up easy to operate dislike consumables are more expensive but i think the cheaper cut 50 torch heads can be swapped out the lotos torch wipe has a 3 wire plug but only has 2 wires ran in it
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Nice system for the money. Used it hard right out of the box. Did everything I needed. Ran it hard for 3 hrs w/o any issues. Easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't cut as well as stated, machine not a good value because won't work for the largest metal stated. Spend more. Not worth the hassel.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Brooks

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it to cut 16-20 gauge sheet metal and it cuts great so far. The only reason i didn't give it 5 stars is I knocked the torch from about 2 feet and it hit the ground and the ceramic shield on the nozzle shattered. and the price to replace it seems ridicules so I'm using it without.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: It works, lol
customer_reviews.text: Ive only used this on a 110 outlet with the separately purchased pigtail, but it was cutt i n thin stuff like butter. Had to work a bit cutting 1/4 plate on 110v. Just finished making my 220v 100 foot pigtail, lol, so ill update my review after running some 220 cuts. But i have no doubt this will cut as well as all the videos of it put there.
customer_reviews.author: new brewer

customer_reviews.title: Great, with minor annoyance.
customer_reviews.text: Tried this out and it cuts great, I only have two issues. 1. the ground cable is like 6ft at the most. It's less than half the length of the cutting head chord. 2. Consumables and accessories are more expensive and not as available as other brands.
customer_reviews.author: carl de Vries

customer_reviews.title: LT5000 Lotos Plasma Cutter
customer_reviews.text: The product sets up relatively easily and is easy to use. You have to buy your own plug for the electrical cord. I tried it on 110 and it cut fairly well. I would like to see the difference cutting on 220 makes. Also, when I cut, the tip wants to stick to the metal. I am a rookie at this and could not maintain the right distance; too close, it screwed up the tip; too far, it would not cut well. I hope I can find a wheel guide to attach to it to help me maintain the proper distance or possibly a drag tip. But, all in all, a fun little machine.
customer_reviews.author: NewHobby

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: Got it and worked great out of the box. Had issue with LED readout but they quickly sent me a replacement Nice little unit for the money
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: I would run it on 220.
customer_reviews.text: I cut up a whole Volkswagen and it worked really well It got hot one time and I had to wait for a few minutes then went back to work. Burnt up two tips. Not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked good
customer_reviews.text: only use it a couple of times and it seems to be as good as our Esab unit on smaller metal
customer_reviews.author: Jwhulon

customer_reviews.title: Great for the value
customer_reviews.text: This machine works great for the money. Very light and portable. We use it on small construction jobs. Be sure to buy the pigtail.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Dave

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! Took a chance on this cutter and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! Took a chance on this cutter and it makes great cuts. Used it on 24G metal all the way up to 1/2"! Done great
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Bunton

customer_reviews.title: New toy in my garage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple weeks ago. And i must say im inpressed. I read alot of the reviews, more good than bad. Went on youtube checked out some vids and had to see for myself. Alot of people complained about no power cord. Lotus must have heard about the complaints. Because mine came with the 220 hook up. All i needed to do was run it out off of my service box. I hooked everything else up. Turned it on. Started cutting. Had no problems cutting 1/8 to 3/8 thick steel. The instructions are cheesy. I worked with plasmas before had no problems hooking it up. I wood recomend this to anyone .
customer_reviews.author: steve thompson

customer_reviews.title: Bargain, Bargain, Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Great fast & friendly service! I recommend this machine to anyone wishing to get started in plasma cutting. The Lotos plasma cutter is easy to use, it cuts clean and can be set up for 110v or 220v I purchased the Lotus after comparing reviews and prices. This light weight cutter cuts like a big unit. I would highly recommend this cutter for any related application. It's amazing for such a small unit. It has worked flawlessly and with consistently good results.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hostetter

customer_reviews.title: ... couple days a week use and it has been great, air line fitting leak but that’s an easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it for about two months now of a couple days a week use and it has been great, air line fitting leak but that’s an easy fix
customer_reviews.author: mason w.

customer_reviews.title: Plasma cutter
customer_reviews.text: My husband is impressed with this cutter. It does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: RetrieversAreGolden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cutter, it's small but powerful, the sere cutting 7/8 is definitely a stretch though.
customer_reviews.author: Tummys10

customer_reviews.title: Welding
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once, and never used one before. I couldn't get it to work on 110v, but that could be me. I hooked it to 220v and worked great! It did go through the tips fast, but it was rusty and painted surface. So my first try. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Stevan

customer_reviews.title: Fun and fast, good seller.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work great, still in learning time but I think it'll fit my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ed grillot

customer_reviews.title: Great cutter
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and it cuts well! It’s very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Y. zheng

customer_reviews.title: Heavy on cutting, light on the wallet!!
customer_reviews.text: This plasma cutter is seriously the greatest but I have made. I like to do a LOT of metal work as a hobby and needed a plasma cutter. Wired up the 230 plug and this cuts 1/2" like butter. It's a very simple setup too. The only things I didn't like we're the regulator(leaky) and the tips don't last too long. But it's still an awesome machine!
customer_reviews.author: Paulie92

customer_reviews.title: Need to put a 30 amp breaker in if u dint have one already
customer_reviews.text: Works great, love it, I need to put in a 30Amp breaker in.
customer_reviews.author: Smurf

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for a Plasma Cutter that would fit my budget. The reviews on this one were very good and it was well under what I could spend. Its cutting ability is beyond what I expect to need and it is very well made for the price. I have only used it to try it out so far; I am very pleased with how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: LowTechTom

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Work really well I was impressed with it 30 amps burns 3/16 plate steel
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Power
customer_reviews.text: I just got around to using it I have it hooked up to 220v. I have always used name brands before. I got to say for the price this thing is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jose R.

customer_reviews.title: Great cutter!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cutter like crazy. Cuts through anything I've tried. Price is great and quality seems to be good too. Went through the first consumables pretty quick, but still using the second set. Better order you some more when you order your cutter. Throw out the torch.....plasma is the way to go, and this baby does it!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, works great.
customer_reviews.text: works great for automotive sheet metal repairs, light weight, works great with my compressor. Mike in Spokane
customer_reviews.author: Michael LeBret

customer_reviews.title: Lotos plasma
customer_reviews.text: Plasma worked as it should very pleased with the performance. Purchased new consumables for torch they didn’t work, contacted Lotos and they were very helpful. They sent me a completely new torch assembly no charge. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JOSHUA THOMERSON

customer_reviews.title: have to change reviews
customer_reviews.text: only worked for awhile - only using occasionally and now it won't cut hot butter disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne P.

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool
customer_reviews.text: For what this machine is desinged for you cant beat it very nice tool cuts 3/8 steel like butter.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Great service and great machine
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the LT5000D Plasma Cutter on May 14 and got it on May 16. The cutter was damage free, which I was very proud of. It was very easy to put together. The first time I used it the cutter worked great, I had no problem at all. I got it for home use, the first thing I cut was a piece of 1/4 steel and it cut though it like cutting butter. I would greatly recommend the LT5000D plasma cutter to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: James Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Does what they said it would do
customer_reviews.text: Does every thing it says it will in the ad. Cuts 1/2 metal great!! Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: cut through 1/8" steel plate like butter. Great buy for occasional use and super ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time, cut through 1/8" steel plate like butter. Great buy for occasional use and super price.
customer_reviews.author: h20sgt

customer_reviews.title: I am pretty happy with this plasma cutter
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty happy with this plasma cutter. I had my doubts since I've always had top brand plasma cutters. It cuts very good. The cover on the torch is the only thing that I wasn't happy with. It is a thin plastic cover and you just have to watch when cutting so parts of the hot metal don't land on it or it will melt.
customer_reviews.author: kevin coker

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive. NOT cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my use, which is cutting up to 1/8' steel. Cuts clean and easily through autobody panels. Controls are easy to see and understand. Even the directions are good.
customer_reviews.author: PecanBoy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first one I have ever had, or used for that matter, but this is great, I use it to cut out letters and decorations on old corrugated roofing. It works great. I have it setup to run on 120 vac so I can use it anywhere there is a receptacle.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Walker

customer_reviews.title: LT500D Performs Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using this plasma cutter and I have been able to cut, steel, and aluminum up to 1/4" thick with no problems. The item is light weight and I can move it around the shop easily. The included plasma torch cable is long enough to make using the cutter very convenient. I had no problem installing a 220 volt drier plug and I made an extension cable to enable me to place the LT5000D anywhere in my shop.
customer_reviews.author: PHC

customer_reviews.title: This is an OK unit for home use
customer_reviews.text: The unit is fine for home use and small projects.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what is stated. I've cut patterns into 6 4x8 sheets. Paid for itself after the first sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Monita III

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: The lotus 5000 is awesome, works great for me. Only trouble was making a 220 plug myself,no one sells a jumper to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only disappointment I have is that its dual voltage
customer_reviews.text: The only disappointment I have is that its dual voltage, but the 110 volt adapter has to be purchased separately. The machine performs great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for metal work! Great Machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! Fantastic for heavy cuts in tight places sawzall and metal cutting discs just can't reach! Also ordered grade 5 safety glasses, welding mask too dark to see lines or marks. Order extra plasma tips, not that they're fragile...but the aggravation of not being able to use the machine when you really need it! Definitely recommend this machine!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for a Great price
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. I don't know why I waited so long to buy one. Cuts as nice as you hand is steady.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Weekend warrior.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent plasma cutter for the weekend fabricator. We never have hit the duty cycle on it after hours of use. The plastic regulator nut was the only item that failed, not the highest quality regulator for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I got my wife to buy this for me noting that it would help me get things done I needed to and have more time to spend with her. I thought it would probably take a little time to get setup and learn it use the Lotos Plasma Cutter, but it didn't . It took it from the front door to the garage plugged it in and started cutting. I think it is a great product for the price. Cutting everything!
customer_reviews.author: Audrie A. Crane

customer_reviews.title: QC/shipping issue, still worth it
customer_reviews.text: this certainly does not cut like a thermal dynamics unit but for the weekend warrior it cannot be beat. mine arrived with the trigger broken off, there is still enough left to make it work. cuts great. definitly worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Latitude Sixty North

customer_reviews.title: The best plasma cutter! The best price!
customer_reviews.text: This plasma cutter is doing pretty well at my place... all the cuts I made were precise. I ordered the attachment for cutting circles and lines... a real necessity if you want to cut effectively... Yes, I will recommend this cutter to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Order this plasma cutter on a whim as I have a few small projects that could be done much cleaner and ultimately quicker with a plasma cutter. Fearful of the prices of most larger known brands, I found the LOTOS plasma cutter and after reading the reviews - placed the order. Amazon's always been great about returns for unsatisfied purchases, so I saw it as a zero risk purchase. Opened it up, got everything hooked up, and was cutting an inch piece of metal with relative ease shortly thereafter. For small jobs, this is a gem.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: LOTOS 5000D plasma cutter
customer_reviews.text: I have had a small 110 volt L-Tec for years that works OK for thin stuff. It cost $600 15 years ago, The LOTOS was less money and higher capacity. Because of the low cost for the LOTOS I figured it might be junk. After reading the reviews I bought the LOTOS and WOW- it does everything it's advertised to do.It cuts aluminum, steel, and stainless steel with no problems whatsoever. I'm very pleased with this unit and will be a very happy welder if it lasts me 15 years. Highly recommended, big bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.T

customer_reviews.title: was amazed how good this unit works
customer_reviews.text: Was a litte apprehensive about this unit, because of the cost, and size, once I used it, was amazed how good this unit works! Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this machine.. plus the price you can't beat it
customer_reviews.author: juan q.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cutter!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to cut 1/4 inch metal nder 110V. The AMP out put is 35 A and PSI setting is about 50 PSI. It cut well. Great Cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Xinyu Shen

customer_reviews.title: No WAY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would not cut what I was wanting it to do when I saw it in the box. This little thing no way I thought I was going to send it back and it would have been a waist of my time and money. WRONG. this little unit surprised me cuts great. looking forward to using it a lot and I am going to put it to the test. Cutting 16 ga. Thanks really nice unit for the money
customer_reviews.author: stanley griffitts

customer_reviews.title: Work for only a small time then stops!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year and it worked great. Went out to do some cutting and now there is no SPARK! Kinda upsetting in my books...
customer_reviews.author: Carol M Enkey

product_meta.title: LOTOS LT5000D 50A Air Inverter Plasma Cutter Dual Voltage 110/220VAC 1/2" Clean Cut
product_meta.description:
As one of the largest manufacturers of plasma cutting, tig/stick, arc (MMA) welding equipment in the world, Lotos Technology is proud to offer an extensive selection of industrial plasma cutting machine, LT5000D. Lotos LT5000D is designed and constructed to withstand extensive use in rugged industrial and construction environments. It is perfect for any home project too. Lotos LT5000D is a 50A dual voltage 110/220vac Digital Inverter Plasma Cutter (50A). Using this portable plasma cutter is cheaper than Oxyacetylene after just a few cuts. Less cleaning, less maintenance, less noxious gases, less fire hazard, simply less overall work and a better, cleaner cut. The torch trigger can be moved for a custom fit. It can be used in finger or thumb positions. Torch head is low profile for tight spaces. High Frequency DC Plasma cuts thicker materials than standard DC plasma cutters. High Frequency Plasma cuts faster with less distortion in the work piece. The LOTOS LT5000D Plasma Cutter delivers strong cutting performance in a compact package. An optimized design based on state-of-the-art MOSFET transistors provides high power output for thick metal cutting, as well as steady output for thin metal cutting. Using Pulse-Width-Modulation (PWM) technology, the inverter power supply generates powerful DC welding currents. By employing switch power inverter technology, the dimensions and weight of the main transformer is significantly reduced; while efficiency is increased by 30%. The LT5000D is an excellent choice for home DIY jobs and light duty small business projects.



SPECIFICATIONS

Input Voltages

110-220V, 1-PH, 50/60 Hz

Input Current

110-220V, 1-PH, 20 A

Output Current

10-50 A

Duty Cycle @ 40°C (104°F)

60% @ 50A, 110V

60% @ 50A, 220V

Dimensions with Handle

15” (381mm) L



6” (152.4mm) W



12” (304.8mm) H

Weight

22.5 lbs (10.2 kg)

Gas Supply

Clean, dry, oil-free air

Recommended Gas Inlet Flow Rate / Pressure

3.6 scfm @ 65 psi

Input Power Cable Length

6’ (1.8 m)

Maximum Severance Cut Thickness*

3/4”

MATERIALS CUTTING THICKNESS*

Mild Steel

Max. 5/8”(16mm) @ 50A

Stainless Steel

Max. 1/2”(12mm) @ 50A

Aluminum

Max. 1/2”(12mm) @ 50A

WHAT'S INCLUDED

Plasma cutting torch (1)

9'9" long, 3 prong

Ground clamp & cable (1)

6'8" long

Air filter & regulator (1)

regulates 0~150psi

Air hose connections (6) 

4 clamps, 2 couplers

Air hose (1)

-

WARRANTY

1-Year Warranty


* Production cutting thickness are the results of LOTOS's laboratory testing. Production speeds are approximately 80% of maximum.
feature_bullets: ★ Air PLASMA CUTTER: SUITABLE CUTTING for Stainless Steel, Alloy Steel, Mild Steel, Copper, Aluminum, etc. Uses non-hazardous compressed air to cut, safe and at low cost.
★ SAFE AND AT LOW COST: compact plasma cutter has a handle for portability and uses non-hazardous compressed air to cut stainless steel, alloy steel, mild steel, copper, and aluminum.

★ THE COMPATIBLE CONSUMABLES SETS for this BROWN Color LT5000D Plasma Cutter are "LCS22" or "LCS33". Please search "Lotos LCS22" or "Lotos LCS33"; ★ It CANNOT compatible with Lotos LCOn20, LCON40 or LCON90 Consumables Sets or any other third part consumables set

★ SETUP WITHIN 1 MIN: The pre-installed NPT 1/4” industry type D plug and air filter regulator allows you to quick connect to your air compressor by using the stand coupler existing on your air compressor. The whole machine can be setup quickly within 1 min.

★ OUTPUT & PERFORMANCE: 10-50 A DC output, 1/2” ideal clean cut and 3/4” maximum severance cut under 220/240V. 10-35A DC output, 1/3" ideal clean cut and 2/5" maximum severance cut under 110/120V. Engine Power : Electric (AC)
★ DUAL VOLTAGE INPUT: Automatic Dual Voltage / Dual Frequency (110/120 V 220/240 V 50/60Hz).
★ PAPST ADVANCED COOLING SYSTEM: ensure the plasma cutter have a stable and durable high performance.
★ PACKAGE INCLUDES: Power supply, Plasma cutting torch, ground clamp, Pre-installed NPT 1/4” industry type D plug and Air filter regulator, consumables, Instruction Manual, etc.
★ BUY WITH CONFIDENCE--We offer 30 days refund and 1-year , please submit registration form on our website.
